673253833464635054191677274350925861527651788483 = 149706 OK
2333133121414131499 => 6204 NOK
23222120202525282820202020272722212121 = 7705 OK
22222228282828222222282829212324252627282920 = 9447 OK
48274728818 = 1752 OK


For == :
00...111..999
00999111.....

00...111..999...
00999111........

00...111999
00999111...

00...111999..
00999111.....
[...] is in fiPos, use that to check for mergeNeeded

for <:
00...111..99  (5 block)
0099.111.... (6 block) (so +2)

00...111..99....
0099.111........

00...11199.
0099.111...

00...11199
0099.111..
[..] (fiLen) is in fiPos too
